overview:
ICCS, a Business Process Outsourcing company, proposes to assist your setup by not only executing the typical outsourced BPO services, but by committing to provide the essential support for escalation to next levels. To this end, in capacity of a BPO company, we have worked out a befitting partnership model, wherein we suffice as your operational arm and thus make the growth transformation easier & profitable.

We launched operations as a BPO call centre, in the year 2002, with the brand title â€˜Atsoft Servicesâ€™. Over the years, to meet diverse client needs, service offerings increasingly became customized and thus to formalize the transition, Atsoft Services has been rebranded as ICCS.

ICCS is in Domestic BPO in Delhi NCR, Domestic BPO in India, Call Centre in Delhi NCR, Customer Care Call, centre in Delhi NCR, Business Process Outsourcing, Inbound/outbound call center services, BPO, Call Centre, Delhi and NCR, Delhi call Centre, Delhi BPO, Customer call solutions, Customer call, Domestic Call centre, Domestic BPO.

for more details logon to www.iccs.in

image.attribution: ICCS:: Insight Customer Call Solutions Pvt Ltd. is the Domestic BPO in Delhi and NCR.
